review: How have i not yet recommended this, GET IT

YES YES YES YES YESLYNE IS LOVELYNE IS LIFEThis game, is cheap (i got it 75% off when i crafted a badge, but it is already cheap)Its simple, and gets addicting fast.With its level groups A-Z, each containing around 25 puzzles each(fogot exact), and daily puzzles coming out, uh, daily.You won't run out.Finishing a level gives a boost of dopamine into my brain.
